results.description: Spain keep up their 100% record at the top of Group F with a win in Romania.

results.title: Adrian Popa: Reading loan Romania midfielder to Ludogorets

results.description: Fulham striker Aleksandar Mitrovic scores twice as Serbia are held at home by Romania in League C of the Nations League.

results.description: Poland and Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski escapes serious injury after a flare explodes near him during a 3-0 win in Romania.

results.description: Uefa opens proceedings against Albania and Romania after incidents during Sunday's Euro 2016 match in Lyon.
results.title: Euro 2016: Uefa to investigate trouble during Albania's win over Romania

results.description: Albania record their first major tournament win with victory over Romania that gives them hope of reaching the Euro 2016 last 16.

results.description: Reaction and analysis as France win Group A, Switzerland reach the last 16 and Albania beat Romania to secure third place.
results.title: Euro 2016: Group A finale

results.description: Dimitri Payet's late winner against Romania at Euro 2016 was redemption for the "hurt" he has endured in his France career, says Thierry Henry.
results.title: Euro 2016: Thierry Henry says France's Dimitri Payet was 'hurt'

results.description: Dimitri Payet scores a stunning late winner to give hosts France a 2-1 victory over Romania in the first game of Euro 2016.
results.title: France 2-1 Romania

results.description: Dimitri Payet scores the winning goal for France courtesy of a stunning strike in their 2-1 victory over Romania in the opening game of Euro 2016.
results.title: Euro 2016: Dimitri Payet scores stunning France winner
